## File Organization Rules

- All README files and documentation files (*.md) must be stored in the `readme/` directory
- When creating new README or documentation files, always place them in `readme/` folder
- File naming convention: Use descriptive names in Japanese or English (e.g., `readme/色の設定.md`, `readme/hooks設定.md`)
- Exception: Root README.md and .claude/README.md can stay in their respective locations
